trans-unit.source: Provides the base class with members common to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> and the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSFederationHttpBindingElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供成員通用於 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSFederationHttpBindingElement" /> 的基底類別 (Base Class)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The configuration name of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 繫結的組態名稱。

trans-unit.source: This value should be unique because it is used as identification for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個值應該是唯一的，因為它會當做繫結的識別使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to bypass the proxy server for local addresses.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，這個值會指定近端網址是否略過 Proxy 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the proxy server is bypassed for local addresses; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果近端網址略過 Proxy 伺服器，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP hostname comparison mode used to parse URIs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於剖析 URI 的 HTTP 主機名稱比較模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode" /> value that specifies the HTTP hostname comparison mode used to parse URIs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode" /> 值，指定用於剖析 URI 的 HTTP 主機名稱比較模式。

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之繫結項目的內容，初始化此繫結組態區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存繫結所處理之 TCP 訊息的緩衝集區大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size (in bytes) for a buffer pool that is processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 由繫結處理之緩衝集區的大小上限，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a message that can be processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可由繫結處理之訊息的大小上限 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in bytes, for a message that is processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 由此繫結處理之訊息的大小上限，單位為位元組。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 65,536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65,536 位元組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoder used to encode the message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來對訊息進行編碼的編碼器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSMessageEncoding" /> value that specifies the encoder used to encode the message.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WSMessageEncoding" /> 值，指定用來對訊息進行編碼的編碼器。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WSMessageEncoding.Text" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.WSMessageEncoding.Text" />。

trans-unit.source: The binding to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要套用的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified binding to this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的繫結套用至這個 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSDualHttpBindingElement" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 執行個體，其中包含可能是屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 物件的集合或這個組態項目之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> objects that can be attributes or <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> 執行個體，其中包含可能是屬性之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty" /> 物件或這個組態項目之 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定 HTTP Proxy 位址的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies the address of the HTTP proxy.
trans-unit.target: 指定 HTTP Proxy 位址的 URI。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement.UseDefaultWebProxy%2A> property is set to `true`, the value of this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingBaseElement.UseDefaultWebProxy%2A> 屬性設為 `true`，這個參數的值將被略過。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結所設定的端點處理。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas" /> that specifies the complexity constraints.
trans-unit.target: 指定複雜性條件約束的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas" />。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints include items such as a maximum element depth, or a maximum length for string content within the message.
trans-unit.target: 複雜度條件約束的包含項目，包括最大項目深度，或是訊息內的最大字串內容長度。

trans-unit.source: The constraints protect against a type of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜度困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a configuration element that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得組態項目，這個組態項目會指定是否已為使用此繫結設定的端點啟用可靠的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingOptionalReliableSessionElement" /> that specifies whether reliable sessions are enabled for the endpoint configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.StandardBindingOptionalReliableSessionElement" />，指定是否已為使用此繫結設定的端點啟用可靠的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在繫結上發出訊息時使用的字元集編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> value that specifies the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 值，指定要在繫結上發出訊息時使用的字元集編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，這個值會指定繫結是否支援流動 WS-Transactions。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the binding supports flowing WS-Transactions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結支援流動的 WS-Transactions，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value specifies that clients do not flow transactions and services reject messages with a flowed transaction message header.
trans-unit.target: 預設值指定用戶端不會流動異動，且服務拒絕具有流動異動訊息標頭的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the system’s auto-configured HTTP proxy is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定是否使用系統自動設定之 HTTP Proxy 的布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the system’s auto-configured HTTP proxy is used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用系統自動設定的 HTTP Proxy，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。
